abstract.t: This memo presents some modifications to the Routing Policy Specification Language (RPSL) discussed in and subsequently updated in , creating the third generation of the language. It fixes some issues left from the previous standards, and enhances the language. Enhancements include the addition of recommendations for using RPSL to describe routing policies in Internet Exchange environments running route servers and other minor corrections.
